item.title: New client will not connect to source
item.dc:creator: @xdstyle007 xdstyle007
item.description:
@xdstyle007 wrote:

Try putting your server ip inside the “”, “”, “” inside the gui.java
Example: “anyscape.no-ip.biz”, “anyscape.no-ip.biz”, “anyscape.no-ip.biz”

Read full topic
item.source: New client will not connect to source

item.title: New client will not connect to source
item.dc:creator: @emo_skill emo skill
item.description:
@emo_skill wrote:

I have a new client that is the updated version of my source (base is delta). My client will not connect to the server claiming it is offline while it is definitely online because I’ve been using another client and other players have been able to connect as well. My client.java looks like this:[code]{

Gui.server = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null, “projectspy.no-ip.biz:43594”, “projectspy.no-ip.biz”, 1);
if(Gui.server != null && Gui.server != “”){
anInt833 = 2;
[/code]

and the gui.java looks like:System.out.println("connecting to Project Spy"); Serverip = "projectspy.no-ip.biz"; sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

In the egui.java it looks like this: client.main(new String[] { "", "", ""
I have tried variations of this and adding the ip to those quotes and things and I just can’t get it to work. Any help would be appreciated, and if teamviewer is necessary that is fine with me. Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
